messages.message: Seeing the same issue again - has this been resolved?
@Alex Sgueglia do you know if Rolly is running his tests now or if we're doing anything significant in this environment?
He said he would tell us before running the load test and i didnt see anything come in about that.  We are doing some development work but nothing that significant in terms of load
:thinking_face: okay  @William Helmrath these 500s are at the same endpoint as previously noted in the alert?
Huh, the 500's have been super consistent since around 2:30 AM

The calls are coming every 5 seconds or so, and they’re all asking for the status of `7853d78f-850d-4800-8892-847d94f57de5` @suleiman.odat could you quickly check if there’s anything interesting about that job?
same issue as the other run, classifier is failing
not sure if the input doc is same as the others
They’re also all flagged `"remote_addr": "155.188.180.248"`  which is not in the ip-whitelisting list. This same IP has been making this same call for hours and getting 500'ed the whole time.
Correction, that’s in the whitelist, I must have had the wrong page up when looking.

The IP is coming from NW the `NW-On-prem-sever`  range of `155.188.0.0/16` , so I think maybe Rolly has a script that retries the check until it gets a good response, and doesn’t ever check if the response is not `2xx`
I have rolly on the call with me should I ask?
Yes, also concurrently trying to trace down why 500 is the response we’re giving
yes he has a job running and every 5 seconds a script keep checking the status
can you reach out to his ticket to inform the correct way? Or does he have a ticket for it?
He's been asked to open a ticket for the issue that is causing the 500, but this is a separate issue.
